sentences.sContent: The firm wanted to chisel him out of his overtime pay.
sentences.sContent_eng: The firm wanted to chisel him out of his overtime pay.
sentences.sCn: 公司想要剥夺他的超时加班费。

sentences.sContent: If you go even one second overtime in these contests, you lose automatically.
sentences.sContent_eng: If you go even one second overtime in these contests, you lose automatically.
sentences.sCn: 在类似的比赛中，你即使只超时一秒，也会自动输掉比赛。

sentences.sContent: ...I'd specifically asked if I could leave early last Friday as I done a lot of overtime during the week...

phrases.pCn: 加班加点工作，超时工作
